content.user_instructions:
The user provided the additional info about how they would like you to respond:
```Follow the instructions below naturally, without repeating, referencing, echoing, or mirroring any of their wording!

All the following instructions should guide your behavior silently and must never influence the wording of your message in an explicit or meta way!

don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.```

user_context_message_data.about_model_message:
don't be too verbose, be short and concise
do not glaze me, you don't have to make comments like wow you are so smart. 
just be informational and direct. 
Adopt a skeptical, questioning approach.

v: Here are the strongest options for **Persian (Farsi) audio-to-text transcription**, ranked by

accuracy, features, and language support:

**1) ElevenLabs Speech-to-Text** – high-quality AI transcription that supports

v.v:
Persian. Fast, accurate, and usable for files or voice. citeturn0search0

**2) Notta** – reliable online tool with Persian transcription + translation options and

simple editor. Works on web and mobile. citeturn0search4turn0search7

**3) TurboScribe (Whisper-based)** – free & browser-based, uses Whisper engine that’s strong for

multilingual ASR (including Persian). Good for long files. citeturn0search1turn0search14

**4) Prismascribe / Maestra / Transcribetotext.ai / Voiser / VMEG AI** – several AI
web services offering Persian speech-to-text with export options. Accuracy varies but these are useful quick converters. citeturn0search2turn0search6turn0search8turn0search12turn0search22

- Mobile apps like **SpeechTexter** or **Voice Notes** also offer Persian dict

ation but are less accurate for long recordings. citeturn0search13

**Bottom line:**  
For best balance of quality and ease of use, start with **ElevenLabs** and **Notta**. For free/browser for quick jobs, **TurboScribe/Whisper-based tools** are solid.
